name: Kinkshamed (itch)
description:
Artwork by Tamyra C., S. Berry, 5thezombie
Soundtrack courtesy of Bensky
Special thanks to Hannah Telle, James and Crywank

     Morgan and Jackson, a young couple in their mid-20's, have banked it all on their new business of producing kink videos for sale online. When piracy and social stigma becomes a roadblock, the two set out to try and correct course and assist those who have been regret partaking in the eccentric modeling game.

    Go throughout the state of 'Carolina' meeting up with old friends and new contacts as they couple attempt to rebuild their business and lessen the sting of kink shaming  as they try and maintain the reputation of their brand, navigating their way through confused newcomers and less-than-sociable fans and legitimize their business as far as they can.
